content.text: What are the latest diagnostic tools for lupus?

Recent advancements include high-resolution imaging, such as CT scans for organ-specific involvement, and advanced biomarkers like anti-dsDNA and anti-Smith antibodies. Multi-omics approaches are also gaining traction in early-stage diagnostics.
Can you recommend a good podcast on lupus research?
Certainly! 'Lupus Science & Medicine Podcast' offers insights into the latest research. Additionally, the YouTube channel 'Autoimmune Corner' provides excellent visual explanations.
What’s trending in lupus research on Twitter?
The latest buzz is around the use of AI to predict lupus flares using wearable devices. Researchers are also discussing the impact of the microbiome on lupus progression.
